Translations.Text: Ami ki apanara baksa um'mukta kare de'ini
ami laghaba karechi apanara bojha
ya chila apanara jan'ye atisaya duhsaha.
Ami apanara alocanake samucca karechi.
Niscaya kastera sathe sbasti rayeche.
Niscaya kastera sathe sbasti rayeche.
Ata'eba, yakhana abasara pana parisrama karuna.
Ebam apanara palanakartara prati manonibesa karuna.
Sapatha anjira (dumura) o yayatunera
ebam sina'i prantarastha tura parbatera
ebam e'i nirapada nagarira.
Ami srsti karechi manusake sundaratara abayabe.
Atahpara take phiriye diyechi nica theke nice.
Kintu yara bisbasa sthapana kareche o satkarma kareche, tadera jan'ye rayeche asesa puraskara.
Atahpara kena tumi abisbasa karacha keyamatake
allaha ki bicarakadera madhye srestatama bicaraka nana
patha karuna apanara palanakartara name yini srsti karechena
srsti karechena manusake jamata rakta theke.
Patha karuna, apanara palanakarta maha dayalu
yini kalamera sahayye siksa diyechena
siksa diyechena manusake ya se janata na.
Satyi satyi manusa simalanghana kare
e karane ye, se nijeke abhabamukta mane kare.
Niscaya apanara palanakartara dike'i pratyabartana habe.
Apani ki take dekhechena, ye nisedha kare
eka bandake yakhana se namaya pare
apani ki dekhechena yadi se satpathe thake.
Athaba khodabhiti siksa deya.
Apani ki dekhechena, yadi se mithyaropa kare o mukha phiriye neya.
Se ki jane na ye, allaha dekhena
kakhana'i naya, yadi se birata na haya, tabe ami mastakera samanera kesaguccha dhare hemcaraba'i
mithyacari, papira kesaguccha.
Ata'eba, se tara sabhasadaderake ahabana karuka.
Ami'o ahabana karaba jahannamera prahariderake
kakhana'i naya, apani tara anugatya karabena na. Apani sejada karuna o amara naikatya arjana karuna.
Ami eke nayila karechi sabe-kadare.
Sabe-kadara samandhe apani ki janena
sabe-kadara hala eka hajara masa apeksa srestha.
Ete pratyeka kajera jan'ye pheresatagana o ruha abatirna haya tadera palanakartara nirdesakrame.
Eta nirapatta, ya phajarera udaya paryanta abyahata thake.
Ahale-kitaba o musarekadera madhye yara kaphera chila, tara pratyabartana karata na yataksana na tadera kache suspasta pramana asata.
Arthat allahara ekajana rasula, yini abrtti karatena pabitra sahipha
yate ache, sathika bisayabastu.
Apara kitaba praptara ye bibhranta hayeche, ta hayeche tadera kache suspasta pramana asara pare'i.
Taderake echara kona nirdesa kara hayani ye, tara khamti mane ekanisthabhabe allahara ebadata karabe, namaya kayema karabe ebam yakata debe. Eta'i sathika dharma.
Ahale-kitaba o musarekadera madhye yara kaphera, tara jahannamera agune sthayibhabe thakabe. Tara'i srstira adhama.
Yara imana ane o satkarma kare, tara'i srstira sera.

Tadera palanakartara kache rayeche tadera pratidana cirakala basabasera jannata, yara taladese nirjharini prabahita. Tara sekhane thakabe anantakala. Allaha tadera prati santusta ebam tara allahara prati santusta. Eta tara jan'ye, ye tara palanakartake bhaya kara.
Yakhana prthibi tara kampane prakampita habe
yakhana se tara bojha bera kare debe.
Ebam manusa balabe, era ki hala
Sedina se tara brttanta barnana karabe
karana, apanara palanakarta take adesa karabena.
Sedina manusa bibhinna dale prakasa pabe, yate taderake tadera krtakarma dekhano haya.
Atahpara ke'u anu parimana satkarma karale ta dekhate pabe
ebam ke'u anu parimana asatkarma karale ta'o dekhate pabe.
Sapatha urdhbasbase calamana asbasamuhera
atahpara ksuraghate agnibicchuraka asbasamuhera
atahpara prabhatakale akramanakari asbasamuhera
o yara se samaye dhuli utksipta kare
atahpara yara sakradalera abhyantare dhuke pare
niscaya manusa tara palanakartara prati akrtajna.
Ebam se abasya e bisaye abahita
ebam se niscita'i dhana-sampadera bhalabasaya matta.
